title: New: Kuhn – Stoneskipper (S.Maharba Remix)
content:
Having remixed WU LYF earlier on in the year, s.

maharba has graced us with yet another fantastic attempt, this time at cutting up Kuhn’s Stoneskipper. Seemingly heavy on the Flying Lotus influence, it morphs the original almost beyond recognition, introducing a drum and bass inspired element to the track. As the comments on Soundcloud indicate, this remix goes hard and almost feels like it should be soundtracking a sci-fi horror flick. Mindfuck all round.

Kuhn – Stoneskipper (S.Maharba Remix) by S.Maharba
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
